sections.heading: Levy against earnings prohibited within six months after determination of exemption--Change of financial status--Civil penalty for violations
sections.text: Section 21-20-2 - Civil penalty against attorney or agent for levy on earnings after determination of exemption.Section 21-20-3 - One penalty for one levy.
